pr_title: Adding extension to support Custom Key IDs

timeline.message: Add KeyIDProvider interface and DefaultKeyIDProviderImpl implementation
Add methods to register custom KeyIDProvider implementations to Data holder during OSGi activation
Change the KeyID Calculation logic to the new KeyIDProvider based method
Fixed styling issues pointed in review
Add debug logs for KeyIDProvider implementation

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * Method to obtain KeyID value for the JWT header.
          
          
            
                 * Method to obtain 'kid' value for the signing key to be included the JWT header.
timeline.author: mefarazath

timeline.bodyText: Is passing the Keystore reference useful here in the exception message?
timeline.author: mefarazath

replies.bodyText: Since the method is about getting the certificate from the tenant domain, the Keystore reference calculated using that value does not seems useful. Therefore I will remove it.
replies.author: dimuthnc

timeline.message: Refactored Exception message in getCertificate method
